name: yazee
description:
Yazee is a traditional dice game designed for simple and fast play. A Yazee (5 of a Kind) is 50 points, but a second Yazee yields a bonus of 100 points. Yazee is easy to learn, but difficult to master. Hone your skills using a hint that reveals the optimal choices.

Loaded dice improves your odds of rolling a value of your choosing; it is possible to average nearly 500 points per game with loaded dice.

Use Game Center to track accomplishments and compare your best scores to others around the world. Set player names to keep track of your own high scores and average score on your device.
